select a.user_account as userAccount, a.user_name as userName, a.user_sex as userSex, a.user_phone as userPhone, a.user_email as userEmail, a.user_id_card as userIdCard, a.user_code as userCode, a.version as version from t_sys_user a, t_sys_customer b where b.is_delete = 0 and a.user_code = b.user_code
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and a.user_account like concat('%', #{userAccount}, '%')
